TEXT.TITLE: JUDGE TO RULE MONDAY ON BURLINGTON <BUR> CASE
TEXT.BODY: Manhattan Federal Court Judge Shirley Wohl Kram said she would rule Monday on whether to grant a request to block a 78 dlr per share merger agreement between Burlington Industries Inc and Morgan Stanely Group Inc <MS>. The request to bar the merger was made by Samjens Acquisition Corp, a partnership formed by financier Asher B. Edelman and Dominion Textiles Inc. Samjens has made a hostile 77 dlr per share takeover bid for Burlington. Reuter
